text: Keely Nicole Hodgkinson (born 3 March 2002) is an English athlete who mainly does the 800 metres race. She won gold in the 2024 Paris Olympics, as well as winning the gold medal at the 2021 European Indoor Championships in Toruń, Poland. She was the British champion after she won the 800 metres event at the 2020 British Athletics Championships with a time of 2 min 03.24 sec. ==International competitions== Representing / 2018 European U18 Championships Győr, Hungary 1st 800 m 2:04.84 2019 European U20 Championships Borås, Sweden 3rd 800 m 2:03.40 2021 European Indoor Championships Toruń, Poland 1st 800 m i 2:03.88 2021 Olympic Games Tokyo, Japan 2nd 800 m 1:55.88 AU20R 2022 World Indoor Championships Belgrade, Serbia – 800 m i ==Notes== ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:British athletes Category:Sportspeople from Greater Manchester Category:People from Wigan Category:Medalists at the 2024 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Great Britain
title: Keely Hodgkinson
